title: Grateful Dead Live at The Scope on 1982-04-03
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi CR-5A > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > R8Brain SRC > Wavelab (adding 16-bit patches) > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 1644 tagged. Transferred by Andrew F. 12/2017
source: AUD: Nakamichi CM300/CP4 shotguns > lead deck (?) > Sony TC-D5 > Maxell XLII 90's, recording by Craig L.
